snippet: Mayor Dave Bing of Detroit has suspended Police Chief Ralph Godbee after accusations emerged that he was having an extramarital affair with a subordinate.
abstract: Detroit Mayor Dave Bing suspends Police Chief Ralph Godbee after accusations emerge that he was having an extramarital affair with a subordinate.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Dave Bing of Detroit has suspended Police Chief Ralph Godbee after accusations emerged that he was having an extramarital affair with a subordinate.

headline.main: Michigan: Detroit Police Chief Is Suspended
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit Police Chief Is Suspended
